tool_description: Records and tracks escalation actions, decision points, and outcomes to maintain audit trail and support process improvement analysis.

to_agent.description: Target agent or team for escalation

error_messages: Invalid escalation action: Action must be a recognized escalation type. Check available action types.
Agent not found: from_agent or to_agent identifier not found in system. Verify agent IDs.
Empty reason: escalation_reason cannot be empty. Provide clear justification for escalation.
Database connection failed: Unable to record escalation history due to system unavailability.
usage: Record each escalation action with complete details for audit trail. Provide clear reason and context to support future analysis and process improvement.

history_entry_id.description: Unique identifier for this history entry

previous_escalations.description: Count of previous escalations for this ticket

recording_status.description: Status of history recording (success, failed, pending)
